title: 'Small-town kids' shape future of China's consumption
text:
'Small-town kids' shape future of China's consumption Thursday, April 26, 2018 - 01:46
Until now, China's consumption has been led by residents of the capital and free-spending coastal cities. But as Eve Johnson reports, the hinterland has been catching up fast, transformed by industrialization and rapid urbanization in the last 10 years.
Until now, China's consumption has been led by residents of the capital and free-spending coastal cities. But as Eve Johnson reports, the hinterland has been catching up fast, transformed by industrialization and rapid urbanization in the last 10 years. //reut.rs/2I1jpMN
